translation.header: I'm a Full Stack developer, I use React and Node.js to create complete web applications.
translation.footer: Developing complete solutions to transform ideas into digital experiences.
translation.name: Name
translation.text1: Hi, I'm a Full Stack developer with almost two years of experience. I like challenges and I am always looking to improve my skills to create efficient solutions.
translation.text2: During a knowledge fair in 2018, my school group developed a smart socket remotely controlled. My role in the project was to calculate the energy consumption, which sparked my interest in programming. After graduating from high school, I enrolled in a 10-month vocational course at Univates. During the course, I faced difficulties with a project and sought help from a professional in my city. That support not only helped me complete the task but also led to my first opportunity in the field, where I developed the website for Sollar Sul as a front-end developer. I am extremely grateful for this chance, as it marked the beginning of my career and pushed me to take on new challenges in web development.
translation.technologies: These are the technologies I use on a daily basis.
